Valley Visitor.name: Valley Visitor
Valley Visitor.desc: Reach World 6, the Spirited Valley! You'll love it here, all the spirits are very friendly!

Beanstacker Prodigy.name: Beanstacker Prodigy
Beanstacker Prodigy.desc: Add 14 different golden foods to The Beanstalk.

That's MY Crown.name: That's MY Crown
That's MY Crown.desc: Have a stack of exactly 100,000,000 Royal Headpiece in your Storage Chest.

Leet Lanterns.name: Leet Lanterns
Leet Lanterns.desc: SECRET ACHIEVEMENT ------------------------ Oh yea, that's a good number. Sure, it's no 69420, but it's vintage!

Science Undergrad.name: Science Undergrad
Science Undergrad.desc: Find 30 unique crops, as shown by the Crop Scientist!

W6 is Donezo.name: W6 is Donezo
W6 is Donezo.desc: Get a Lava Skull or higher on every Spirited Valley monster in the Deathnote.

Top Floor Sneaking.name: Top Floor Sneaking
Top Floor Sneaking.desc: Reach what seems like the top Floor of Sneaking with the Eldar Kingulyte guest.

Legumulucky.name: Legumulucky
Legumulucky.desc: Make a crop trade with the Legumulyte worth exactly 777 magic beans.

Science Post Doc.name: Science Post Doc
Science Post Doc.desc: Find 110 unique crops, as shown by the Crop Scientist!

Big Time Land Owner.name: Big Time Land Owner
Big Time Land Owner.desc: Get 27 plots of land in your farm.

Lil' Overgrowth.name: Lil' Overgrowth
Lil' Overgrowth.desc: Get an overgrowth of 32x on a single crop.

Yellow Belt.name: Yellow Belt
Yellow Belt.desc: Find a 论50 Yellow Belt Sneaking Charm. Yes, exactly 论50.

Lucky Stealy.name: Lucky Stealy
Lucky Stealy.desc: Successfully find 6 items in a row, in a single AFK claim within Sneaking.

Scorin' the Ladies.name: Scorin' the Ladies
Scorin' the Ladies.desc: Have a stack of exactly 250,000 Ladybugs in your Storage Chest.

Science Graduate.name: Science Graduate
Science Graduate.desc: Find 70 unique crops, as shown by the Crop Scientist!

Spectre Stars.name: Spectre Stars
Spectre Stars.desc: Complete all constellations in the Spirited Valley. You can check your progress within the Telescope.

Doctor Repellant.name: Doctor Repellant
Doctor Repellant.desc: Have 10,000 or more Apple crops in your Depot at once. You can lock the first crop before it grows to guarantee an apple!

Effervess Enthusiess.name: Effervess Enthusiess
Effervess Enthusiess.desc: Have a stack of exactly 5,000,000 Effervescent Logs in your Storage Chest.

Straw Hat Stacking.name: Straw Hat Stacking
Straw Hat Stacking.desc: SECRET ACHIEVEMENT ------------------------ It's a shame you can't wear them all at once...

Major Overgrowth.name: Major Overgrowth
Major Overgrowth.desc: Get an overgrowth of 1,024x on a single crop.

Beanstacker Trainee.name: Beanstacker Trainee
Beanstacker Trainee.desc: Add 5 different golden foods to The Beanstalk.

This, is, Summoning!.name: This, is, Summoning!
This, is, Summoning!.desc: Survive for 200 seconds in the Endless Summoning Mode, which isn't out yet.

Penta Defence.name: Penta Defence
Penta Defence.desc: Reach Wave 50 in Breezy Battle without placing more than 5 Towers in total.

Cob Enjoyer.name: Cob Enjoyer
Cob Enjoyer.desc: Have 1,000,000 or more Corn crops in your Depot at once. Mmmm, Corn!

Ceramic Sneaking.name: Ceramic Sneaking
Ceramic Sneaking.desc: Reach the Sneaking Floor with the Petrified Ceramist guest.

Big Big Hampter.name: Big Big Hampter
Big Big Hampter.desc: SECRET ACHIEVEMENT ------------------------ Hampter is worth it!

Crop Flooding.name: Crop Flooding
Crop Flooding.desc: SECRET ACHIEVEMENT ------------------------ That's... That's enough... THAT'S ENOUGH WATER! THAT'S ENOUGH!

Ghost Buster.name: Ghost Buster
Ghost Buster.desc: SECRET ACHIEVEMENT ------------------------ You took out the baddest spirit of them all!

desc: Complete all constellations in the Smolderin' Plateau. You can check you progress within the Telescope.
Complete all constellations in the Smolderin' Plateau. You can check your progress within the Telescope.
